entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 08:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: SE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
